objects.description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has used `netstat -ano` on compromised hosts to enumerate network connections.(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory Volt Typhoon June 2023)(Citation: Secureworks BRONZE SILHOUETTE May 2023)
